citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30PM on
20-Mar-17.
Left voice and text messages on facility representative's phone and had contact with a facility employee who
informed me the facility representative was not available.
